A reward for a curator, this amount is i: A reward for a curator, this amount is included in the total value of the bounty.
Account does not have enough funds.
After a bounty was proposed the council: After a bounty was proposed the council decides whether to fund it or not.
Allocation value is smaller than the min: Allocation value is smaller than the minimum bounty value.
Choose a curator whose background and ex: Choose a curator whose background and expertise is such that they are capable of determining when the task is complete.
Choose the Beneficiary for this bounty.
Curator has been proposed by council. Th: Curator has been proposed by council. The bounty is waiting for curator to accept the role.
Curator's account that will reward the b: Curator's account that will reward the bounty to the implementer.
Curator's deposit is calculated based on: Curator's deposit is calculated based on the accepted curator's fee for this bounty.
Curator's deposit will be slashed and cu: Curator's deposit will be slashed and curator will be unassigned. Bounty will return to the Funded state.
Curator's fee can't be higher than bount: Curator's fee can't be higher than bounty value.
Description of the Bounty (to be stored: Description of the Bounty (to be stored on-chain)
How much should be paid out for complete: How much should be paid out for completed Bounty. Upon funding, the amount will be reserved in treasury.
If the motion is approved, Curator's dep: If the motion is approved, Curator's deposit will be slashed and Curator will be unassigned. Bounty will return to the Funded state.
If the motion is approved, the current C: If the motion is approved, the current Curator will be unassigned and the Bounty will return to the Funded state.
Only curator can extend the bounty time.
Only the account proposed as curator by: Only the account proposed as curator by the council can create the assign curator transaction
Only the account proposed as curator by the council can create the unassign curator transaction
Part of the bounty value that will go to: Part of the bounty value that will go to the Curator as a reward for their work
Proposer bond depends on bounty title le: Proposer bond depends on bounty title length.
Reward the bounty to an implementer's ac: Reward the bounty to an implementer's account. The implementer will be able to claim the funds after a delay period.
Select an account which (after a success: Select an account which (after a successful vote) will act as a curator.
Select the account you wish to propose t: Select the account you wish to propose the bounty from.
Select the council member account you wi: Select the council member account you wish to use to create a motion for the Bounty.
Select the council member account you wish to use to create a proposal for closing bounty.
The Curator account that will be used to: The Curator account that will be used to send this transaction. Any applicable fees will be paid by this account.
The Curator account that will give up on: The Curator account that will give up on it's role.
The Curator that will be slashed.
The Curator that will be unassigned: The Curator that will be unassigned
The account that will create the transac: The account that will create the transaction.
The account that will sign the transacti: The account that will sign the transaction.
The council member that will create a mo: The council member that will create a motion, submission equates to an "aye" vote for chosen option.
The council member that will create the: The council member that will create the close bounty proposal, submission equates to an "aye" vote.
The council member that will create the motion, submission equates to an "aye" vote.
The council member that will create the motion.
The extended expiry date does not depend: The extended expiry date does not depend on the current expiry date.
The note linked to the extension call, e: The note linked to the extension call, explaining the reason behind it.
The note that will be added to the trans: The note that will be added to the transaction. It won't be stored on chain
The total payment amount of this bounty,: The total payment amount of this bounty, curator's fee included.
This account will accept the curator rol: This account will accept the curator role.
This account will be used to create an e: This account will be used to create an extend bounty expire transaction.
This account will be used to create the: This account will be used to create the unassign curator transaction.
This account will propose the bounty. Bo: This account will propose the bounty. Bond amount will be reserved on its balance.
This action will Slash the Curator.
This action will accept your candidacy f: This action will accept your candidacy for the curator of the bounty.
This action will create a Council motion: This action will create a Council motion to either approve or reject the Bounty.
This action will create a Council motion to propose a Curator for the Bounty.
This action will create a Council motion to slash the Curator.
This action will create a Council motion to unassign the Curator.
This action will create a Council propos: This action will create a Council proposal to close the Bounty.
This action will extend expiry time of t: This action will extend expiry time of the selected bounty.
This action will reject your candidacy f: This action will reject your candidacy for the curator of the bounty.
This action will reward the Beneficiary: This action will reward the Beneficiary and close the bounty after a delay period.
This action will unassign you from the c: This action will unassign you from the curator role.
This amount will be reserved from origin: This amount will be reserved from origin account and returned on approval or slashed upon rejection.
This amount will be reserved from your a: This amount will be reserved from your account and returned after bounty claim is confirmed or if you give up, unless you are slashed earlier.
This amount will be sent to your account: This amount will be sent to your account after bounty is rewarded and you claim curator's fee.
This bounty has received approval and is: This bounty has received approval and is currently being implemented.
This bounty was approved by the council. When the next spend period starts, it will be funded.
This bounty was completed and the benefi: This bounty was completed and the beneficiary was rewarded by the curator. Claiming the payout will be possible after the delay period is over.
You are giving up your curator role, the: You are giving up your curator role, the bounty will return to the Funded state. You will get your deposit back.
title: title
